content: Cowabunga, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and they mean business. Each of these stylin’ backpacks contains ample storage – including pockets for water bottles or ooze canisters – and each feature a thugged-out portrait of the four Turtles.

titleEN: Keep Calm And Shut Up Shirt
content: Make a mockery of the ever growing commercialized business of the “Keep Calm” slogan with this parody t-shirt. This stylish shirt pokes fun of the now iconic “Keep Calm and Carry On” phrase by replacing the wording with instructions to “shut up and shut up”.

Claim your territory at the office whiteboard by tagging it up with your insignia using the spray paint dry eraser marker. Ideal for dry erase boards or window displays, it helps you create art work that can be erased with a few swipes of the eraser.

Pay the gold price and sit on your very own throne with this life size Game Of Thrones inspired replica of the Iron Throne. Featuring the swords of fallen cosplayers, the throne is truly the ultimate piece of furniture for your modern day castle.

Combine your love of dungeons and dragons with raving when you play with these LED dice. While the grossly unbalanced sides may not make them ideal for actual usage, the bright neon lights make them a shoe in at any ecstasy laced table top role playing game.

Get serious about your water sports by transforming your pool with the inflatable volleyball court. Made from durable PVC, this fully inflatable court sprawls across the water’s surface to create the perfect arena for a full five on five game.

Commemorate the Battle of Hoth like a true Star Wars fan with the AT-AT lawn ornament. Depicting a fallen AT-AT, the ornament’s snow white facade blends in wonderfully during wintertime and stands up to all types of weather conditions.

Harness the dark side of the Force to cook your meats by using the Darth Vader lightsaber BBQ fork. With a commanding handle shaped like Vader’s lightsaber hilt, this stainless steel BBQ fork skewers your various meats with the tyrannical precision you require.

Cross “get in an aerial dogfight” off your bucket list after signing up for the military fighter pilot experience. You’ll be paired up with a skilled pilot to outsmart, outmaneuver, and outgun your opponents while pulling six G’s in various aerial acrobatic maneuvers.

Create an environment as majestic as the night sky in your own backyard using the fiber optic pool lights. When strewn across the pool, the lights create a beautifully lit underwater atmosphere that’ll take your party/event to the next level.

Create a one of a kind lighting effect in your home when you flick the switch and light up the recycled bicycle parts chandelier. These recycled bike parts prove they’re far from retired as they come together to form a one a kind lighting fixture.

Lick down your favorite 007 actor with this Daniel Craig inspired frozen body popsicle. With a license to chill, this beefed up dessert makes your wildest dreams come true as you run your tongue up and down his perfectly chiseled torso.

Receive a first class ending to your crappy workday by embarking on a relaxing journey on the Boeing 747 engine bed. This luxury bed features a unique Boeing engine bed frame that’ll give you the best sleep you’ve had in years.

Keep your phone charged when you’re miles away from civilization with aid from the portable solar charger. A true life saver, this portable charger is small enough to fit comfortably in your pocket and is designed to charge your phone via USB cable.

Annihilate your targets without simultaneously damaging your own eardums with the shotgun suppressor. The first of its kind, you’ll be able to suppress the loud blast and remain camouflaged while hunting the ultimate prey – <del>Ice-T</del> man.

Place a logical Vulcan touch to your office’s drab decor with the Mr. Spock business card holder. The iconic Vulcan hand sign gently cradles your collection of business cards and sits atop a base that displays the “live long and prosper” message.

Lug your crap around with the best handheld gaming device ever made with this Game Boy backpack. Styled just like the classic handheld, it delivers a dose of nostalgia while keeping all your gear safe with its padded sides and breathable mesh back.

Witness the pinnacle of modern fireworks technology with this pooping dog firework. Once the wick is lit, Fido grits his teeth and unleashes an explosive dump of epic proportions that’ll make your holiday celebration a day to truly remember.

Be prepared for anything by becoming a deadly warrior after taking private ninja lessons. While in class, a knowledgeable Shidoshi instructs you on everything from philosophy to combat strategies of this iconic 900 year old martial art.

Put a whole new spin on dessert the next time you serve up a delicious chocolate pizza pie. This sugar-packed treat is 360 degrees of pure bliss – eight perfectly cut slices jam packed with every type of chocolaty treat under the sun!

When it comes to functionality and style, you’d be hard pressed to find a better candidate than the Rubik’s cube mini fridge. This compact fridge will keep your drinks and snacks nice and cool while adding to the room’s eclectic decor.

Bash in some zombies and then build a small fort from their remains using the construction and destruction hammer. Forged from steel and outfitted with a non slip rubber grip, the hammer’s distinct form allows it to be used for a wide range of jobs.

Ensure your valuable notes survive the harsh weather conditions by writing them in the waterproof notepad. Now even if it begins to rain or your backpack accidentally falls into a river, you’ll still be able to write down whatever you need.

Wear a tie that defies space and time’s ever changing fashion rule with one of these Doctor Who themed ties. Ideal for adding flair to any outfit, you can choose from one of two vibrant designs – a TARDIS print or the retro pattern sported by the Fourth Doctor.

When hunger strikes you can’t be expected to waste precious time unwrapping your snacks before eating them! Thankfully, the invention of edible cupcake wrappers is now a reality, so that when you’re hungry you can simply dig in!

Add a retro feel to your 21st century gaming with the Bluetooth NES controller. Compatible with both Windows and Apple platforms, the controller gives you the same great feel as the classic gaming console when you play your favorite mobile games.

Start your day off with an adrenaline rush every time you head out with the slide staircase. Rather than exerting precious energy walking downstairs like a chump – just sit on your butt and let gravity do all the work for you as you make your way down the stairs in record time.

Become the drunkest gun in the west faster than anyone else by drawing a frosty brew out of the leather beer holster. Made from genuine leather, this holster gently cradles your bottle of suds so it’s always ready when you are.

Turn your undervalued jewelry collection into priceless treasure by storing in the mermaid treasure chest. This custom chest provides ample storage space and comes decorated with intricate nautically themed details like vivid coral and a crab shaped lock.

Disarm dangerous booby traps with ease using this military grade micro grappling hook. This lightweight grappling hook is small enough to fit comfortably in the palm of your hand and features a sturdy stainless steel frame that’ll last for countless missions.

Boredom will be the last thing on the agenda the next time you travel with the portable arcade console emulator. Encased in a distinguished wooden frame, once opened this retro styled console shines by offering you the chance to play classic arcade games.

Get your fill of Pikachu like you’ve never experienced before when you dine at the Japanese Pikachu Cafe. Found in the land of the rising sun, this geeky restaurant caters their entire menu around Pikachu by styling all their dishes in his likeness.

Arm your wallet with more than just the almighty dollar when you carry around the credit card sized folding knife. This waterproof razor sharp knife fits perfectly in a credit card slot and locks in place when the blade is extended to transform into a very capable knife.

Achieve a rugged look for your home that the whole family will love with the axe legs coffee table. This one of a kind table is a lumberjack’s wet dream – made from solid walnut, it stands on four beautiful hickory axes polished to a mirror sheen.

Keep the bubbly perfectly chilled while you lounge inside of the pool with the floating bottle holder. Made from durable polyethylene, the bottle holder is roomy enough to accommodate enough ice to keep the bottle chilled for hours in the sun.

titleEN: I Park Like An Idiot Stickers
content: Get revenge on the horrendous parking jobs by placing one of these bright and ugly “I Park Like An idiot” stickers on the offender’s car. While it won’t help the offender change in his terrible parking ways, it will surely ruin their day – and that’s the all we can hope for.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones White Walker Mask
content: Take your Game of Thrones cosplay game to a whole new level by wearing a remarkably life-like White Walker mask. The mask wraps around your skull and is crafted with such attention to detail that people will think Winter truly has come.

Look at your lamps in a whole new light by turning on one of these optical illusion lamps. These ingenious lamps takes 3D wire frame images and displays them in a 2D medium through an acrylic glass surface capable of projecting more than just one image.

Commuting to the office using a bike will become a lot more manageable once you start riding with the folding bicycle. Thanks to its unique folding design, you’ll be able to easily store it indoors and avoid the all too common bicycle thief.

A prized cut of quality meat doesn’t need seasoning. However, if you absolutely must season it, the only acceptable choice is Ron Swanson BBQ sauce. This brand needs no sales pitch – if it’s good enough to bear the Swanson name, it’s good enough for you.

Get the skills you need to survive the downfall of civilization by enrolling in the riot training camp. You’ll receive expert advice from military and police professionals, and get to experience the riot from both sides of the conflict.

Swim through the oceans like a majestic ray with the flying sensation underwater glider. Once you grab onto the glider you can cruise and easily maneuver through the water as the glider pulls you along, giving you the sensation of flight – with sharks!

Flex your constitutional right to bear arms in your home – discretely – with this line of gun concealment furniture. With an understated design perfect for any home, you’ll be able to conceal your firearms in everything from the nightstand to the coat rack.

Guarantee your place in the parent hall of fame by surprising the young ones with a battle robot tree house. Modeled after the 75 ton Mad Cat, this tree house’s intimidating facade will tower over the backyard, sending a clear message to the neighbors.

Take advantage of your young padawan’s inability to say “no, you’re humiliating me!” by dressing her up in the adorable Princess Leia baby costume. Featuring Leia’s signature hair buns – it will have your tiny tot looking like the cutest thing in the entire galaxy.

Witness the merciless depths of the ocean from inside the abyss coffee table. The layered design of the coffee table creates jaw-dropping visuals of what our majestic oceans have to offer while providing guests with a nice place to put down their tea or coffee.

Nothing soaks up the spattered blood from a cookout quite like the Slayer BBQ apron. When you have fresh meat that needs a good searing on the grill, you can count on this heavy metal apron to keep your all-black clothing clean while maintaining your metal cred.

They called you crazy, but now you can prove those snobby non-believers wrong when you show them undeniable proof of the existence of the Chupacabra. This elusive creature feeds on goats and other small animals, and now you can examine it like never before!

The all-matte black Rolex is the epitome of subtle elegance. With an all-black tactical design that would have Bruce Wayne drooling with envy, this stylish waterproof timepiece offers a certain rugged appeal that makes it great for dressing either up or down.

Stop wasting money on expensive laxatives, because now you can scare the shit out of yourself – literally – by reading one of these horror story toilet papers. Each roll will send chills down your spine with an enthralling story guaranteed to keep you at the edge of your seat.

Wear more than meets the eye by accenting your outfit with the Transformers Bumblebee ring. Crafted in the likeness of everyone’s favorite Transformer, its made from a sterling silver frame accentuated with gold plating and diamonds.

Store your cash, credit cards, ID, as well as your lady gear in this blinged out watermelon clutch purse. This juicy summertime favorite features glistening crystals across its body with a seed shaped push lock closure at the top for quick access and securing.

Take command of the USS Enterprise as you engage in a rousing game of frisbee with the Star Trek USS Enterprise frisbee. Shaped like the USS Enterprise from the original series, you simply grab on to the saucer and throw it in the most logical way possible.

If people can’t handle your innate incredibleness, that’s their problem – keep their hater stares at bay with the deal with it pixelated sunglasses. Apart from protecting your eyes from harmful UV rays, these low resolution specks will keep you looking impeccably stylish.

When you play with the Game Of Thrones weapons, you either win or you pretend to die – there is no middle ground. Crafted from only the finest Valyrian foam – you’ll be able to wield either the mighty Longclaw used by Jon Snow or Ice used by Eddard Stark.

Whisk the kids to a magical land full of excitement and mythical beings with the Labyrinth movie dolls. Crafted with a superb level of artistry, each doll will capture your child’s imagination and keep them entertained for hours – unless they have an iPad. Then they won’t care.

Make the crappy world around you look as incredible as your Instagram feed of painfully staged photos with the Instagram filter sunglasses. Simply put them on, and watch as the world around you is bathed in a Polaroid-like warmth.

Keep your drink colder than planet Hoth while your hand remains warm and dry with the Star Wars R2-D2 can cooler. Just when you thought you had this little <del>merchandise cash cow</del> droid all figured out, he proves there’s no job he can’t handle.

Werewolves, vampires, zombies – it doesn’t matter – nothing can stop you from slaying the supernatural when you’ve got this handy weapon. Shaped like a wooden stake that houses silver bullets – it’s a must have item for any sound of mind Doomsday prepper.

Ensure you hit your mark every time with the four barrel combination gun. Ideal for collectors and gun enthusiasts, this customized rifle gives the shooter the opportunity of firing up four different sized bullets without having to reload or switch firearms.

Those irritating little Martians are back and are looking to make your outfit look out of this world. The Mars Attacks leggings are insanely comfortable and come plastered with a multicolored portrait of the freakishly disturbing Martians on each leg.

Create amazing visual displays that you can design to your liking with the customizable light cube. This stellar cube provides relaxing ambient lighting while treating your eyes to a abstract and vivid work of art that will hypnotize your mind.

Make your furry friend visible at night with the illuminated pet collar. Apart from the obvious fashion benefits, the collar works great for animals that like to go on night time strolls with their owners – or pets who really want to stand out from the pack.

Slice your way through a savory pie like a true Trekkie with the Star Trek Enterprise pizza cutter. The body of the Enterprise serves as a comfortable handle while the saucer-like front of the ship houses the separate blade that slices through the dough.

Chug down Uranus as you enjoy a bottle of planetary beer – the solar system’s best brew. Each bottle in this set of planetary beers is inspired by composer Gustav Holst’s orchestral composition “The Planets”, so you can stay classy while getting hammered.

Provide your children with a long lasting irrational fear of teddy bears when you let them play with this animatronic undead toy. The teddy bear’s disturbing persona comes to life as he first talks in a creepy tone before ripping his own bloody face off.

Let your favorite Time Lord tell you what time of the day it is with the Doctor Who wall clock. The creative design displays all twelve of Doctors portrayed on the iconic Sci-Fi series since its original start in the 1960s – making it the ultimate gift for any Whovian.

See if you’ve got what it takes to race with the best of them when you take on the professional racing scene with the advanced racing simulator. This state of the art system will allow you to experience the thrill of racing the world’s fastest cars at a fraction of the price.

Take on the forces of evil by arming yourself with the Mega Man buster gun. This full sized replica fits comfortably over your arm and features trigger activated lights and sound effects to make your cosplay outfit that much more authentic.

Let the Empire help you tie the room together with the iconic Death Star rug. Modeled after their prized weapon/space station, this 6′ x 6′ rug is handmade with a level of detail fitting for a true Star Wars fan’s home decorum.

Go motorboating on the tiggest ol’ bitties you’ve ever seen with this giant boobies bounce house! For a 15 dollar admission price you can turn your wet dreams into reality by jumping around in this inflatable house, leaving you with many long lasting mammaries.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones Night’s Watch Cape
content: Endure the most unforgiving winter conditions during your patrol duty on the wall with the Game of Thrones Night’s Watch cape. This serviceable cape is made from faux fur mantle – so no friggin’ sweet direwolves were harmed in the making of the cape.

Catch the most thrilling ride of your life – even when the water is completely flat – with the motorized surfboard. Powered by a capable 100CC 2-stroke engine that will propel you at speeds up to 35 MPH, you’ll be absolutely shredding every body of water you come across!

Redefine the way you think about relaxation with the hanging trampoline bed. The bed’s innovative design wonderfully combines different elements to produce an original, versatile and extremely comfortable piece of furniture you’ll love.

The grass hammock combines the relaxing feeling of laying on a field of grass while gently swaying to and fro for the ultimate R&R experience. Both UV and water resistant, you’ll be able to enjoy this summertime activity year round.

Put your wits to the test as you try to outmaneuver your opponent while playing the laser tag board game. The game works by utilizing pyramid shaped pieces with mirrors to strategically reflect a low powered laser and knock out your opponents pieces.

Add a splash of color to your morning routine with a refreshing shower under the color changing shower head. Rather than having to deal with boring clear water, you’ll be doused by a visually pleasing and physically refreshing rainbow of cleanliness.

Yo dawg, we heard you liked chocolate chip cookies. So why not eat your chocolate chip cookies in a bowl made of chocolate chip cookies?! This completely edible serving bowl takes any snacking session from gluttonous to downright orgasmic!

Add an iconic piece of video game history onto your collection with the Doom Action figure. The controversial image from the game’s cover comes to life as it’s skillfully recreated in stunning color and detail – complete with evil horned demons.

Combine your love of Star Wars and skating into one rad package with the recycled skateboards AT-AT. Masterfully crafted from used skateboard decks, it perfectly portrays an AT-AT walker oppresively trudging along to its next destination.

Turn cloudy days into bright and sunny days with the flick of the switch. The cloud shaped pendant lamp set replaces dated and unsightly lamps with charming, puffy cumulus clouds that brighten up the dimmest of rooms instantaneously.

Turn every drive into an adventure when you get behind the wheel of the TRON Camaro. This custom design Camaro seamlessly blends the old school charm of this muscle car with the futuristic design inspired by the hit film TRON.

Relive some of Mario’s greatest 8-bit adventures as you transform your home into the Mushroom Kingdom with the Super Mario Bros wall graphics. Every 8-bit character from the classic Nintendo game is present – from the Mario brothers to the Goombas.

Give yourself some sick tats without the pain or life long commitment by using this temporary tattoo pen! For creative types who love to draw, this pen allows you to take your artwork to a new medium and create realistic looking, long lasting tattoos on yourself!

Sneak your precious booze into public places like a true alcoholic by concealing it in the sunscreen bottle drinking flask. The design will fool others into thinking it’s nothing more than innocent sunscreen – allowing you to mask your destructive addiction to booze.

Flavor your next meal with RAW ENERGY when you incorporate the powdered caffeine shaker into your meal preparation. While it may put you on the fast track to heart-attack city, you’ll be more alert than ever before. It’s like Redbull minus the taste of piss!

Hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor HODOR hodor hodor hodor. Hodor hodor hodor! Hodor, hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor. Hodor – hodor hodor hodor! Hodor hodor hodor hodor; hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor.

Hold the cosmos in the palm of your hand with the smartphone planetarium projector. Using just your smartphone to navigate, you can project various images of different planets and stars to transform the walls of any room.

Get behind the wheel of this futuristic thorium powered car and you’ll be able to drive to the ends of the earth – and back – without ever having to refuel! Thanks to the magical power of science this nuclear powered car can go on for decades without ever having to “gas up”.

Step out onto the battlefield with confidence when you arm yourself with the paintball minigun. With this behemoth of a weapon in your capable hands, the opposing team won’t stand a chance as you blast them with round after round of paint.

The mutant powers you’ve always dreamed of are finally within the realm of possibility thanks to these DIY wrist mounted flamethrowers. The flamethrowers allows you to shoot a stream of fire up to 12 feet – so make sure you have the fire department on speed dial.

Kill some time the old fashioned way with the Where’s Waldo t-shirt. When your smartphone runs all out of juice, the intricate and nearly overwhelming design on the shirt will keep you entertained for hours as you search for the bespectacled Waldo.

Establish yourself in the pecking order of bad bitches by boldly displaying your rank with the Bitch 1 & 2 shirts. Playing off Dr. Seuss’s iconic style, the shirts come in a variety of loud colors so everyone will notice when the top two bitches roll through the hood.

Make any ordinary hairstyle stand out by adding a little spark with the dragon hairclip. This pint-size dragon – though small in size – is beautifully handcrafted with such attention to detail that it wouldn’t surprise you if it springs to life and flies away one day.

Maximize your electrical outlets to the fullest with the pivoting wall plug/USB charger. Ideal for modernizing your home, the charger pivots for your convenience and features a USB port so you can charge all your electronic devices simultaneously.

Show off your fabulous wealth by blinding those around you with the insane amount of multicolored jewels on the rainbow Rolex.  With 56 perfectly cut diamonds and 36 multicolored sapphires complementing the watch, it’s sure to set you apart from the crowd.

A long time ago in a groovy galaxy far, far away people decorated their pads using the lightsaber lava lamp. This classic staple of the ’70s incorporates a Star Wars inspired design that makes them look like Darth Vader and Luke Skywalker’s might lightsabers.

Behold the 370 inch television – the greatest achievement in the history of man – and everything you’ve ever wanted. With 370 inches of pure 4K high definition bliss, you’ll be able to experience your favorite flicks like you never thought possible.

Behold – these carbon fiber tools are the last set of tools you’ll ever need to buy! No matter what the task, these sturdy tools – made from high strength carbon fiber and stainless steel teeth – will step up to the challenge every single time without falter.

Kobe, Angus, and Wagyu beef don’t even come close to matching the rich texture and taste of canned dragon meat. Freshly slain and featuring the most savory parts of the dragon, it’s always a memorable evening when you serve up a heaping helping of dragon meat!
